channel.title: AMS:UMG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AMS:UMG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Universal Music Group Files Confidentially for US Listing
item.description: Universal Music Group NV has filed confidentially for a US listing, which would fulfill the terms of a deal with billionaire Bill Ackman’s hedge fund Pershing Square.
